name: Code39ChecksumPolicy
summary: Policy for handling optional Code39 checksum characters.

fields.name: None
fields.summary: Do not strip checksum characters (default, avoids accidental data loss).

fields.name: StripIfValid
fields.summary: Strip the trailing character if it matches a valid checksum.

fields.name: RequireValid
fields.summary: Require a valid checksum and strip it; otherwise decoding fails.
